name: Sauda
target:
First, Last, Close, Strong,
Leaping Sword obeys Target Priority.
inGameDesc: With a calm fury, Sauda can carve Bloons up with her twin razor-sharp swords.

statusEffects.name: Bloon Bleed
value: Level 9-16: 1 damage per 2.0s or 20 MOAB-class damage per 2.0s, for up to 4 seconds
Level 17+: 10 damage per 2.0s or 50 MOAB-class damage per 2.0s, for up to 6 seconds

levels.levelBody:
Description: Slashes with both swords at nearby Bloons. Can pop Camo.
Effect: Slashes at bloons, producing a partial AoE in front of her in a 90°-180° formation. Attacks every 0.4s, deals 1 damage, +1 Ceramic and MOAB-class damage, 4 pierce, and range of 23.

Description: Pops more Bloons per attack.
Effect: Pierce increased from 4 to 5.

Description: Leaping Sword Attack: Sauda's dramatic Lead popping leap attack slams down on her targeted Bloons.
Effect: Unlocks Leaping Sword ability. When activated, aims at a target based on her target priority, hitting multiple bloons in a tiny area and leaving behind an "aftersword" that deals contact damage to passing bloons. Cooldown of 30 seconds.


The leap attack creates a 15-radius area-of-effect that deals 20 damage or 100 MOAB-class damage on the initial hit, affecting up to 30 bloons within the area. Can pop Frozen Bloons and Lead Bloons. After the leap attack, she leaves behind her old blades for 6.5s (+0.5s per level after Level 3) after the attack lands, dealing 2 damage onto up to 5 bloons who pass through, refreshing pierce every 0.1s and being able to rehit bloons after 0.2s. This effect can also pop Frozen Bloons and Lead Bloons.

Description: Sauda's swords slice through 2 layers of Bloons.
Effect: 2 damage, and Ceramic and MOAB-class damage improves from +1 to +2.

Description: Sauda attacks faster.
Effect: +25% attack speed (0.8x attack cooldown). Now attacks every 0.32s.

Description: Increased attack range and popping power.
Effect: Pierce increases from 5 to 7, range from 23 to 26.

Description: Sauda preys on the Bloons' weakness, doing extra damage if they are stunned, and she can now pop frozen Bloons.
Effect: Deals +2 damage to stunned Bloons, +20 damage to stunned MOABs, and also pops Frozen Bloons. Leaping Sword deals even more damage to any stunned target, including the initial impact (+10 stunned damage, or +20 stunned MOAB-class damage) and on-track item's contact damage (+2 stunned damage, or +20 stunned MOAB-class damage).


Calculation for the bonus Leaping Sword impact bonus is +(x/2) for bloons and +(x) for MOAB-class only, where x is base damage of the ability. Likewise, the Leaping Sword on-track contact damage deals +(x) for bloons and +(10 + 5x) for MOAB-class only.

Description: Sauda attacks even faster.
Effect: ~+28.99% attack speed (~0.7813x attack speed). Now attacks every 0.25s.

Description: Bloon Bleed: Sauda pops through 3 layers of Bloon with each strike, and causes a slow damage over time effect.
Effect: Adds a Bloon Bleed effect onto damaged bloons. Bloon Bleed deals 1 damage per 2.0s or 20 MOAB-class damage per 2.0s, for up to 4 seconds, dealing up to 2 ticks of damage. Sword attack deals 3 damage, or +3 to Ceramic and MOAB-class (instead of +2).

Description: Sword Charge: Sauda slides along the whole track, devastating Bloons as she goes.
Effect: Unlocks Sword Charge ability. When activated, she charges from the back of the track path towards the front, damaging any bloon type including Leads. Creates more copies of herself on maps with multiple entries or multiple exits. Deals 30 damage to up to 400 bloons on screen with each copy of herself, plus even more damage to stunned bloons (+15 stunned damage, or +30 stunned MOAB-class damage). Cooldown of 45s.

Description: Sauda inflicts extra damage to any Bloon slowed, immobilized, or taking damage over time from other monkeys.
Effect: Gains extra damage versus "harmed" bloons, inflicting +2 damage to Bloons or +10 damage to MOABs with her main swords. Bloons affected by any valid lingering status effect (e.g. slowdown and/or a damage-over-time), excluding stuns and Bloon Bleed, triggers the aforementioned damage bonus. Can stack with the bonus stunned bloon damage.


In addition, all abilities deal extra damage to "harmed" bloons, and can additively stack with the extra damage to stunned bloons, equal to the amount of bonus damage to stunned bloons (more specifically: Leaping Sword impact +10 "harmed" damage or +20 "harmed MOAB-class" damage; Leaping Sword contact +2 or +20 "harmed MOAB-class"; Sword Charge +15 "harmed" damage or +30 "harmed MOAB-class" damage).

Description: Leaping Sword Attack increases greatly in power.
Effect: Leaping Sword leap deals 40 damage, or 200 to MOAB-class, onto up to 50 bloons. Stunned and/or "harmed" bloons are inflicted extra damage via Leaping Sword (leaping impact: +20, +40 MOAB-class; leaping contact: +3, +25 MOAB-class).

Description: Enchanted blades do more damage and allow Sauda to damage all Bloons.
Effect: Main attack now damages Leads. Main attack also now deals even more damage to stunned Bloons (Bloons: +2 → +3; MOAB-class: +20 → +21).

Description: Sauda attacks even faster.
Effect: +56.25% attack speed (0.64x attack cooldown). Now attacks every 0.16s.

Description: Increased attack range and popping power, and Leaping Sword Attack deals more damage.
Effect: Range increased from 26 to 29, pierce increased from 7 to 9, Leaping Sword ability's after-effects swords deal 4 damage, and Leaping Sword ability impact deals 80 damage instead of 40. Stunned and/or "harmed" bloons are inflicted extra damage via Leaping Sword (leaping impact: +40, +80 MOAB-class; leaping contact: +4, +30 MOAB-class).

Description: Sword Charge greatly increased damage.
Effect: Sword Charge deals 120 damage instead of 30. Stunned and/or "harmed" bloons are inflicted extra damage via Sword Charge (+60 versus bloons, +120 versus MOAB-class).

Description: Sauda's sword attacks slice through many Bloon layers at once.
Effect: Sword deals 4 damage and +4 damage to Ceramic and MOAB-class, alongside a bigger bonus against stunned and "harmed" bloons.


Main attack deals +4 to stunned bloons instead of +3, +22 to stunned MOAB-class instead of +21. Similarly, it deals +3 to "harmed" bloons instead of +2, and +11 damage to "harmed" MOAB-class bloons instead of +10.

Description: Sauda's swords attack with a blur of speed.
Effect: +60% attack speed (0.625x attack cooldown). Now attacks every 0.1s.

Description: Enchanted Blades do extra damage to Regrow, Fortified, and Camo Bloons.
Effect: Deals +2 damage to bloons with Camo, Regrow, Fortified, or any valid combination of the three. For blimps, blimps with Camo and/or Fortified are dealt +10 damage. Damage bonus to those types are mutually exclusive.

Description: More powerful Sword Charge sweeps all track paths three times! Leaping Sword power greatly increased.
Effect: Sword Charge now deals 220 damage, pops up to 1400 bloons, and repeats three times. Leaping Sword leap deals 400 damage, or 560 MOAB-class damage, and pops up to 70 bloons on the initial hit. Leaping Sword's after-effect swords deal 6 damage. All abilities deal more damage to stunned and/or "harmed" bloons (leaping impact: +200, +400 MOAB-class; leaping contact: +6, +40 MOAB-class; charging: +110, +220 MOAB-class).
